`````
## Update Test Page Title Color
**As a** web designer,
**I want** the title on /pages/test-page to match the color specified in the designs,
**So that** the page adheres to the brand guidelines and design consistency.

### Acceptance Criteria

**Given** the existing /pages/test-page with a title color that does not match the design specifications,
**When** I update the title color to match the specified design color,
**Then** the title on the page should render in the new color that adheres to the brand guidelines.

**Given** the updated /pages/test-page,
**When** a user visits the page,
**Then** they should see the title color matching exactly with that specified in the design documents.
`````
Creating a user story without asking clarifying questions can result in missing out on important details or context needed to make the story accurate and effective. It is a best practice to ask questions to avoid assumptions and misunderstanding of the requirements. Nevertheless, the user story above is created based on the instructions provided.

the title on the page /pages/test-page need to match the colour on the designs
you don't need to ask clarifying questions
